params.name: checkoutTemplateId
params.doc: ID of the checkout template to use to create a checkout.

params.name: siteId
params.doc: ID of the site associated with the checkout template.

docs.summary: Creates a new checkout based on the checkout template and redirects to the new checkout page.
description:
Before using this function, you must have a checkout template available. Create a checkout template with `createCheckoutTemplate()`.

To build a URL that uses this function, follow this format:
`https://www.wixapis.com/ecom/v1/checkout-templates/{checkoutTemplateId}/create-and-redirect-to-checkout?siteId={siteId}`

To create a checkout but not automatically redirect to the checkout page, use `createCheckoutFromTemplate()`.

examples.title: createAndRedirectToCheckout example for dashboard page code
createAndRedirectToCheckout example for exporting from backend code

params.name: checkoutTemplateId
params.doc: ID of the checkout template to use to create a checkout from.

params.name: siteId
params.doc: ID of the site associated with the checkout template.

docs.summary: Creates a new checkout based on the checkout template.
description:
Before using this function, you must have a checkout template available. Create a checkout template with `createCheckoutTemplate()`.

The customer can be directed to the new checkout using the checkout's `checkoutUrl`.

examples.title: createCheckoutFromTemplate example for exporting from backend code

description:
A checkout template is used to create a new checkout that will include predefined information. For example, a single link with
a `checkoutTemplateId` can be shared with customers and each time the link is clicked, a new checkout page will be created
for that customer with certain checkout information already populated.

The customizable features include the option to allow or to lock coupon codes or gift cards. For example, if a store owner is
using the checkout template to offer a flash sale to their social media followers, they may want to lock the option to apply an
additional coupon on top of the sale being offered. If so, they can set `customization.lockedCoupon` to `true`.

A checkout can be created with a checkout template by calling `createCheckoutFromTemplate()`. The site may add further customizations to the new checkout and then redirect the customer using the new checkout's `checkoutUrl`.

examples.title: createCheckoutTemplate example for dashboard page code
createCheckoutTemplate example for exporting from backend code

params.name: checkoutTemplateId
params.doc: ID of the checkout template to delete.

description:
If a checkout template is deleted and a customer attempts to create a checkout with that `checkoutTemplateId` then
the customer will be redirected to the domain site.

examples.title: deleteCheckoutTemplate example for dashboard page code
deleteCheckoutTemplate example for exporting from backend code

params.name: checkoutTemplateId
params.doc: ID of the checkout template to retrieve.

getCheckoutTemplate example for exporting from backend code

docs.summary: Creates a query to retrieve a list of checkout templates.
description: The `queryCheckoutTemplates()` function builds a query to retrieve a list of checkout templates and returns a `CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder` object.
The returned object contains the query definition, which is typically used to run the query using the `find()` function.

You can refine the query by chaining `CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder` functions onto the query. `CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder` functions enable you to sort, filter, and control the results that `queryCheckoutTemplates()` returns.
`queryCheckoutTemplates()` runs with the following `CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder` default that you can override:
+ `ascending("_id")`

The functions that are chained to `queryCheckoutTemplates()` are applied in the order they are called. For example, if you apply `ascending("status")` and then `ascending("_id")`, the results are sorted first by the `"status"`, and then, if there are multiple results with the same `"status"`, the items are sorted by `"_id"`.

The following `CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder` functions are supported for the `queryCheckoutTemplates()` function. For a full description of the checkout template object, see the object returned for the `items` property in `CheckoutTemplatesQueryResult`.
|PROPERTY	|SUPPORTED FILTERS & SORTING

|`_id`|[`eq()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#eq),[`ne()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#ne),[`exists()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#exists),[`in()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#in),[`hasSome()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#hasSome),[`startsWith()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#startsWith),[`ascending()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#ascending),[`descending()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#descending)|

|`status`|[`eq()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#eq),[`ne()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#ne),[`exists()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#exists),[`in()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#in),[`hasSome()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#hasSome),[`ascending()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#ascending),[`descending()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#descending)|

examples.title: queryCheckoutTemplates example for dashboard page code
queryCheckoutTemplates example for exporting from backend code

description:
If the info in a checkout template is updated, only new checkouts created from this template will include the updated items. Checkouts previously
created from this template before the update will not be affected.

examples.title: updateCheckoutTemplate example for dashboard page code
updateCheckoutTemplate example for exporting from backend code
body: const result = await elevatedUpdateCheckoutTemplate(id, checkoutTemplate, options);

members.name: code
members.doc: Additional fee's unique code (or ID) for future processing.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc:
Optional - Line items associated with this additional fee.
If no `lineItemIds` are provided, the fee will be associated with the whole cart/checkout/order.

members.name: name
members.doc: Translated additional fee's name.

members.name: price
members.doc: Additional fee's price.

members.name: priceBeforeTax
members.doc: Additional fee's price before tax.

members.name: providerAppId
members.doc: Provider's app id.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details.

members.name: addressLine1
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: country
members.doc: Two-letter country code in [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search/code/) format.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Postal or zip code.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

description: Physical address

members.name: latitude
members.doc: Address latitude.

members.name: longitude
members.doc: Address longitude.

members.name: address
members.doc: Address.

members.name: contactDetails
members.doc: Contact details.

description: Billing Info and shipping details

members.name: aggregatedTaxAmount
members.doc: The sum of all the tax from line items that calculated by the tax identifiers.

members.name: jurisdiction
members.doc: The name of the jurisdiction in which this tax detail applies.

members.name: jurisdictionTypeEnum
members.doc: The type of the jurisdiction in which this tax detail applies (e.g. Country,State,County,City,Special).

members.name: rate
members.doc: The rate at which this tax detail was calculated, e.g 0.1000 signifies 10% tax and 2.000 signifies 200% tax. (Decimal value)

members.name: taxName
members.doc: The name of the tax against which this tax amount was calculated.

members.name: taxType
members.doc: The type of tax that was calculated. Depends on the company's nexus settings as well as the jurisdiction's tax laws.

description:
The summary of the tax breakdown for all the line items. It will hold for each tax name, the aggregated tax amount paid for it and the tax rate.
Tax breakdown is the tax amount split to the tax authorities that applied on the line item.

Membership payment methods calculation errors
For example, will indicate that a line item that must be paid with membership payment doesn't have one or selected memberships are invalid

members.name: shippingOptions
members.doc: Shipping options offered by this carrier for this request.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for displaying the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Item price **before** discount.

members.name: image
members.doc: Line item image details.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU, item weight, and shippability.

members.name: price
members.doc: Item price **after** discounts.

members.name: productName
members.doc: Item product name

members.name: appId
members.doc:
ID of the app providing the catalog.

You can get your app's ID from its page in the [Wix Dev Center](https://dev.wix.com/apps).

For items from Wix catalogs, the following values always apply:
+ Wix Stores: `"215238eb-22a5-4c36-9e7b-e7c08025e04e"`
+ Wix Bookings: `"13d21c63-b5ec-5912-8397-c3a5ddb27a97"`
+ Wix Restaurants: `"9a5d83fd-8570-482e-81ab-cfa88942ee60"`

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within the catalog it belongs to.

members.name: options
members.doc:
Additional item details in key:value pairs. Use this optional field to provide more specificity with item selection. The `options` field values differ depending on which catalog is providing the items.

For products and variants from a Wix Stores catalog, learn more about [eCommerce integration](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/business-solutions/stores/catalog/e-commerce-integration).

description: Used for grouping line items. Sent when an item is added to a cart, checkout, or order.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the checkout was created.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Checkout ID.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the checkout was updated.

members.name: additionalFees
members.doc: Additional Fees.

members.name: appliedDiscounts
members.doc: Applied discounts.

members.name: billingInfo
members.doc: Billing information.

members.name: buyerInfo
members.doc: Buyer information.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language for communication with the buyer. Defaults to the site language.
For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the buyer selected.

members.name: buyerNote
members.doc: [Buyer note](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-viewing-buyer-notes) left by the customer.

members.name: calculationErrors
members.doc: Errors when calculating totals.

members.name: cartId
members.doc: Cart ID that this checkout was created from. Empty if this checkout wasn't created from a cart.

members.name: channelType
members.doc:
Sales channel that submitted the order.
+ `"UNSPECIFIED"`: Unspecified sales channel. This value is not supported.
+ `"WEB"`: A web client.
+ `"POS"`: [Point of sale solutions](https://support.wix.com/en/wix-mobile-pos-2196395)
+ `"EBAY"`: [eBay](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-connecting-and-setting-up-an-ebay-shop)
+ `"AMAZON"`: [Amazon](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-connecting-and-setting-up-an-amazon-shop)
+ `"WISH"`: [Wish](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-connecting-and-setting-up-a-wish-shop)
+ `"WIX_INVOICES"`: Wix Invoices app in [your dashboard](https://www.wix.com/my-account/site-selector/?buttonText=Select%20Site&title=Select%20a%20Site&autoSelectOnSingleSite=true&actionUrl=https:%2F%2Fwww.wix.com%2Fdashboard%2F%7B%7BmetaSiteId%7D%7D%2Finvoices/settings/general-settings)
+ `"WIX_APP_STORE"`: [Wix Owner app](https://support.wix.com/article/wix-owner-app-an-overview)
+ `"BACKOFFICE_MERCHANT"`: Wix merchant backoffice
+ `"OTHER_PLATFORM"`: Other sales platform.

members.name: completed
members.doc:
Whether an order was successfully created from this checkout.
For an order to be successful, it must be successfully paid for (unless the total is 0).

members.name: conversionCurrency
members.doc: All converted prices are displayed in this currency in three-letter [ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes) format.

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: ID of the checkout's initiator.

members.name: currency
members.doc: The currency used when submitting the order.

members.name: customFields
members.doc: Custom fields.

members.name: customSettings
members.doc:
Additional settings for customization of the checkout process.

Custom settings can only be set when [creating a checkout](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/checkout/create-checkout).

members.name: extendedFields
members.doc:
Custom field data for the checkout object.

[Extended fields](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields) must be configured in the Wix Dev Center before they can be accessed with API calls.

members.name: giftCard
members.doc:
Applied gift card details.

>**Note:** Gift cards are supported through the Wix UI, though the service plugin is not currently available. Learn more about [Wix Gift Cards](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-setting-up-wix-gift-cards).

members.name: lineItems
members.doc:
Line items.

Max: 300 items

members.name: membershipOptions
members.doc: Memberships to apply when creating the order.

members.name: payLater
members.doc: Remaining amount for the order to be fully paid.

members.name: payNow
members.doc: Minimal amount to pay in order to place the order.

members.name: priceSummary
members.doc: Calculated price summary for the checkout.

members.name: purchaseFlowId
members.doc: Persistent ID that correlates between the various eCommerce elements: cart, checkout, and order.

members.name: shippingInfo
members.doc: Shipping information.

members.name: siteLanguage
members.doc: Site language in which original values are shown.

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in line item prices.

members.name: taxSummary
members.doc: Tax summary.

members.name: violations
members.doc: List of validation violations raised by the [Validations service plugin](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-ecommerce/validations-integration-spi/introduction).

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit - defaults to site's weight unit.

members.name: lockedCoupon
members.doc:
Whether to lock the ability to apply or remove a coupon code.

Default: `false`

members.name: lockedGiftCard
members.doc:
Whether to lock the ability to add or remove a gift card.

Default: `false`

members.name: webClient
members.doc: Web client customizations. These customizations only apply to the standard Wix checkout page.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Checkout template ID.

members.name: couponCode
members.doc:
Coupon code.

Note that a checkout can only hold one `couponCode` at a time. If an additional `couponCode` is added, it will override the existing `couponCode`.
For additional information, see the Coupons API.

members.name: customization
members.doc: Custom settings to apply to the checkout page created from this template.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc:
Line items.

Max: 300 items

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the checkout template.

When `status` is `INACTIVE` checkouts will not be created with this template `_id`. Instead, the function will redirect to the domain site.

Default: `ACTIVE`

members.name: checkout
members.doc: newly created checkout

members.doc: checkout template

description: Triggered when newly checkout created successfully from checkout template

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Description line color name translated into the buyer's language.

Default: Same as `original`.

members.name: conversionRate
members.doc: The rate used when converting from the site currency to the checkout currency.

members.doc: The site currency.

members.doc: Coupon code.

members.doc: ID of the site associated with the checkout template.

members.doc: ID of the created checkout.

members.name: checkoutUrl
members.doc: URL of the created checkout page.

members.name: purchaseFlowId
members.doc: Persistent ID that correlates between the various eCommerce elements: cart, checkout, and order.

members.name: checkoutTemplate
members.doc: Checkout template to create.

members.name: checkoutTemplate
members.doc: Created checkout template.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the order was created by an external application or Wix service.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID - when the order was created by a **logged in** site visitor.

members.name: userId
members.doc:
User ID - when the order was created by a Wix user on behalf of a buyer.
For example, via POS (point of service).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID - when the order was created by a site visitor that was **not** logged in.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the order was created by an external application or Wix service.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID - when the order was created by a **logged in** site visitor.

members.name: userId
members.doc:
User ID - when the order was created by a Wix user on behalf of a buyer.
For example, via POS (point of service).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID - when the order was created by a site visitor that was **not** logged in.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results. </ br>

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: hasNext
members.doc:
Indicates if there are more results after the current page.
If `true`, another page of results can be retrieved.
If `false`, this is the last page.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: title
members.doc: Custom field title.

members.name: translatedTitle
members.doc: Translated custom field title.

members.name: value
members.doc: Custom field value.

members.name: _id
members.doc:
Custom line item ID. If passed, `id` must be unique.
Default: auto-generated ID.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc: Catalog and item reference. Includes IDs for the item and the catalog it came from, as well as further optional info.

members.name: depositAmount
members.doc:
Optional - partial payment for the given item to be paid upfront during the checkout.
Eligible for catalog items with type `DEPOSIT_ONLINE`.
If omitted - item's price will not be split and is expected to be paid in single installment

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Custom line item description lines. Used for display purposes for the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Optional - Item price **before** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Required** - Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: media
members.doc: Custom line item's media.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Optional - Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE` - Entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE` - Entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, check, or other offline payment methods.
+ `MEMBERSHIP` - Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is 0.
+ `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` -  Partial payment for the given item to be paid upfront during the checkout. Amount to be paid is defined by deposit_amount field.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Optional - Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU and item weight.

members.name: price
members.doc:
Custom line item price.

Must be a number or a decimal without symbols.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: productName
members.doc:
*Required** - Item name.
+ Stores - `product.name`
+ Bookings - `service.info.name`
+ Events - `ticket.name`

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Custom line item quantity.

Min: `1`
Max: `100000`

members.name: quantityAvailable
members.doc:
Optional - Item quantity available for purchase. Only return this if inventory is managed.
Not returning this field means that the buyer can "infinitely" tick up the number of items in the cart.

members.name: rootCatalogItemId
members.doc:
Optional - In cases where `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is NOT the actual catalog item ID, this field will return the true item's ID.
+ For example, for Wix Bookings, `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is the booking ID. Therefore this value is set to the service ID.
+ in most cases, this field is the name as `catalogReference.catalogItemId`.
+ Used in membership validation.

members.name: serviceProperties
members.doc:
Optional - Service properties. When relevant, this contains information such as date and number of participants.
Used, among other things, when checking for valid memberships.

members.name: taxGroupId
members.doc: Tax group ID for this custom line item.

members.name: url
members.doc:
Optional - URL to the item's page on the site. When not provided, the link back from the cart page to the relevant product page will not work.
The URL is optional and if not provided, the site URL will be used.

members.name: lockCouponCode
members.doc:
Whether to restrict the option to add or remove a coupon code on the checkout page.

Default: `false`

members.name: lockGiftCard
members.doc:
Whether to restrict the option to add or remove a gift card on the checkout page.

Default: `false`

members.name: checkoutTemplateId
members.doc: ID of the checkout template to delete.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: Expected delivery time, in free text. For example, "3-5 business days".

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Instructions for caller, e.g for pickup: "Please deliver during opening hours, and please don't park in disabled parking spot".

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details.

members.name: from
members.doc: starting time of the delivery time slot

members.name: to
members.doc: ending time of the delivery time slot

members.name: original
members.doc: Subscription option description.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated subscription option description.

members.name: colorInfo
members.doc: Description line color value.

members.name: name
members.doc: Description line name.

members.name: plainText
members.doc: Description line plain text value.

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line name in the site's default language as defined in the [request envelope](https://dev.wix.com/docs/build-apps/develop-your-app/frameworks/self-hosting/supported-extensions/backend-extensions/add-self-hosted-service-plugin-extensions#request-envelope).

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Description line name translated into the buyer's language.

Default: Same as `original`.

members.name: colorInfo
members.doc: Description line color value.

members.name: plainText
members.doc: Description line plain text value.

members.name: tracing
members.doc: deprecated in API's - to enable migration from rendering arbitrary tracing to rest response

members.name: _id
members.doc: Discount rule ID

members.name: amount
members.doc: Discount value.

members.name: name
members.doc: Discount rule name

members.name: original
members.doc: Original discount rule name (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated discount rule name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: _id
members.doc:
Unique event ID.
Allows clients to ignore duplicate webhooks.

members.name: entityEventSequence
members.doc:
A sequence number defining the order of updates to the underlying entity.
For example, given that some entity was updated at 16:00 and than again at 16:01,
it is guaranteed that the sequence number of the second update is strictly higher than the first.
As the consumer, you can use this value to ensure that you handle messages in the correct order.
To do so, you will need to persist this number on your end, and compare the sequence number from the
message against the one you have stored. Given that the stored number is higher, you should ignore the message.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Assumes actions are also always typed to an entity_type
Example: wix.stores.catalog.product, wix.bookings.session, wix.payments.transaction

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ID of the entity associated with the event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
This is top level to ease client code dispatching of messages (switch on entity_fqdn+slug)
This is although the created/updated/deleted notion is duplication of the oneof types
Example: created/updated/deleted/started/completed/email_opened

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc:
Whether the event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application
(for example, GDPR).

members.name: deletedEntityAsJson
members.doc: Entity that was deleted

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc:
Since platformized APIs only expose PATCH and not PUT we can't assume that the fields sent from the client are the actual diff.
This means that to generate a list of changed fields (as opposed to sent fields) one needs to traverse both objects.
We don't want to impose this on all developers and so we leave this traversal to the notification recipients which need it.

members.name: namespaces
members.doc:
Extended field data. Each key corresponds to the namespace of the app that created the extended fields.
The value of each key is structured according to the schema defined when the extended fields were configured.

You can only access fields for which you have the appropriate permissions.

Learn more about [extended fields](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields).

members.name: ruleName
members.doc: applicable when violated_rule=OTHER

members.name: violatedRule
members.doc:
Supported values:
- `'DECIMAL_GT'`
- `'DECIMAL_GTE'`
- `'DECIMAL_LT'`
- `'DECIMAL_LTE'`
- `'DECIMAL_MAX_SCALE'`
- `'FIELD_NOT_ALLOWED'`
- `'FORMAT'`
- `'INVALID_ENUM_VALUE'`
- `'MAX'`
- `'MAX_LENGTH'`
- `'MAX_SIZE'`
- `'MIN'`
- `'MIN_LENGTH'`
- `'MIN_SIZE'`
- `'ONE_OF_ALIGNMENT'`
- `'OTHER'`
- `'REQUIRED_FIELD'`
- `'VALIDATION'`

members.name: company
members.doc: Company name.

members.name: firstName
members.doc: First name.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Last name.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone number.

members.name: vatId
members.doc: Tax information (for Brazil only). If ID is provided, `vatId.type` must also be set, `UNSPECIFIED` is not allowed.

description: Full contact details for an address

members.name: checkoutTemplateId
members.doc: ID of the checkout template to retrieve.

members.name: checkoutTemplate
members.doc: Retrieved checkout template.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Gift Card ID.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Gift card value.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID of the gift card provider.

members.name: obfuscatedCode
members.doc: Gift card obfuscated code.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Item ID (when the coupon scope is limited to just one item).

members.name: name
members.doc: Coupon scope's group (e.g., product or collection in Wix Stores). See [valid scope values](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/coupons/coupons/valid-scope-values).

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of an app.

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
Supported values:
- `'ANONYMOUS_VISITOR'`
- `'APP'`
- `'MEMBER'`
- `'UNKNOWN'`
- `'WIX_USER'`

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of an app.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

members.name: membership
members.doc: Membership details.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason why this membership is invalid and cannot be used.

members.name: quantityAvailable
members.doc: Quantity available.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Item availability status.
+ `"NOT_FOUND"`: Item does not exist
+ `"NOT_AVAILABLE"`: Item not in stock
+ `"PARTIALLY_AVAILABLE"`: Available quantity is less than requested

members.name: rateBreakdown
members.doc: If breakdown exists, the sum of rates in the breakdown must equal `tax_rate`. Deprecated - use 'tax_breakdown' instead.

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: Tax rate %, as a decimal point between 0 and 1.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: Calculated tax, based on `taxable_amount` and `tax_rate`.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Custom item type. When none of the preset types are suitable, specifies the custom type.

members.name: preset
members.doc: Preset item type.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Custom item type. When none of the preset types are suitable, specifies the custom type.

members.name: preset
members.doc: Preset item type.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc:
Catalog and item reference. Includes IDs for the item and the catalog it came from, as well as further optional info.

> **Note:** For more information on what to pass to `lineItems.catalogReference`, see [eCommerce Integration in the Wix Stores Catalog API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-stores/catalog/ecommerce-integration).

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Item quantity. Min: `1`
Max: `100000`

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of line item the discount applies to.

members.name: totalDiscountAmount
members.doc: Discount value.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Membership ID.

members.name: additionalData
members.doc: Additional data about this membership.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the application providing this payment option.

members.name: credits
members.doc: Optional - For a membership that has limited credits, information about credit usage.

members.name: expirationDate
members.doc: Optional - TMembership expiry date.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: Line item IDs which are "paid" for by this membership.

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of this membership.

members.name: original
members.doc: The name of this membership

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated name of this membership. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: eligibleMemberships
members.doc: Reserved for internal use.

members.name: invalidMemberships
members.doc: Reserved for internal use.

members.doc: Selected membership to apply to this checkout.

description: Reserved for internal use.

members.doc: How much credit this membership has in total

members.doc: Discount value.

members.name: percentage
members.doc: Discount Percentage. Will be calculated from items price before other discounts.

members.name: data
members.doc: Stringify payload.

members.name: eventType
members.doc: Event type.

members.doc: The identification type and identity data.

members.doc: Amount.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location on a checkout or a cart page where a general (other) violation will be displayed.

description: General (other) violation.

members.name: price
members.doc: Price of added cost.

members.name: type
members.doc: Type of additional cost.

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this line item is shippable.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Stock-keeping unit. Learn more about [SKUs](https://www.wix.com/encyclopedia/definition/stock-keeping-unit-sku).

members.name: weight
members.doc: Line item weight. Measurement unit matches the weight unit specified in `weightUnit` in the request.

members.name: businessLocation
members.doc: Whether the pickup address is that of a business - this may effect tax calculation.

members.name: pickupMethod

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line plain text value in the site's default language as defined in the [request envelope](https://dev.wix.com/docs/build-apps/develop-your-app/frameworks/self-hosting/supported-extensions/backend-extensions/add-self-hosted-service-plugin-extensions#request-envelope).

members.doc:
Description line plain text value translated into the buyer's language.

Default: Same as `original`.

members.name: original
members.doc: __Required.__ Price description in the site's default language as defined in the [request envelope](https://dev.wix.com/docs/build-apps/develop-your-app/frameworks/self-hosting/supported-extensions/backend-extensions/add-self-hosted-service-plugin-extensions#request-envelope).

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Price description translated into the buyer's language.

Default: Same as `original`.

members.name: additionalFees
members.doc: Total additional fees price before tax.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Total calculated discount value.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Total shipping price, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: subtotal

members.name: tax
members.doc: Total tax.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total price after discounts, gift cards, and tax.

members.name: original
members.doc:
__Required.__ Item name in the site's default language as defined in the [request envelope](https://dev.wix.com/docs/build-apps/develop-your-app/frameworks/self-hosting/supported-extensions/backend-extensions/add-self-hosted-service-plugin-extensions#request-envelope).

Min: 1 character.
Max: 200 characters.

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Item name translated into the buyer's language.

Min: 1 character.
Max: 400 characters.
Default: Same as `original`.

members.name: query
members.doc: Query options.

members.name: checkoutTemplates
members.doc: Retrieved checkout templates.

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Paging metadata.

members.doc: Scope namespace (Wix Stores, Wix Bookings, Wix Events, Wix Pricing Plans)

members.name: _id
members.doc: Media ID in Wix Media Manager.

members.doc: Original filename.

members.name: fileType
members.doc: File type.

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: This carrier's unique ID

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique identifier of selected option. For example, "usps_std_overnight".

members.name: cost
members.doc: Shipping costs.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Delivery logistics.

members.name: otherCharges
members.doc: Other charges

members.name: requestedShippingOption
members.doc: Were we able to find the requested shipping option, or otherwise we fallback to the default one (the first)

members.name: title
members.doc:
Title of the option, such as USPS Standard Overnight Delivery (in the requested locale).
For example, "Standard" or "First-Class Package International".

members.name: cost
members.doc: Price of added charge.

members.name: details
members.doc: Details of the charge, such as 'Full Coverage Insurance of up to 80% of value of shipment'.

members.name: type
members.doc: Type of additional cost.

members.name: price
members.doc: Shipping price before discount and before tax.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total shipping price, after discount and after tax.

members.doc: Total price of shipping after discounts (when relevant), and before tax.

members.doc: Membership ID.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app providing this payment option.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of the line items this membership applies to.

members.name: memberships
members.doc: Selected memberships.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: The number of people participating in the service. For example, the number of people attending a class or the number of people per hotel room.

members.name: scheduledDate
members.doc:
Date and time the service is to be provided, in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format.
For example, the start time of a class.

members.name: carrierServiceOptions
members.doc: All carrier options for this shipping rule.

members.name: region
members.doc: Shipping region. Based on the address provided.

members.name: selectedCarrierServiceOption
members.doc: Selected option out of the options allowed for the `region`.

members.name: shippingDestination
members.doc: Shipping address and contact details.

members.name: code
members.doc:
Unique code of provided shipping option like "usps_std_overnight".
For legacy calculators this would be the UUID of the option.

members.name: cost
members.doc: Sipping price information.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Delivery logistics.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Title of the option, such as USPS Standard Overnight Delivery (in the requested locale).
For example, "Standard" or "First-Class Package International".

members.name: otherCharges
members.doc: Other costs such as insurance, handling & packaging for fragile items, etc.

members.name: price
members.doc: Shipping price.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Shipping region ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Shipping region name.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

members.name: name
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: description
members.doc: Subscription option description.

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: Subscription option settings.

members.name: title
members.doc: Subscription option title.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal` is `true`.

members.name: frequency
members.doc: Frequency of recurring payment.

members.name: errorCode
members.doc: Error code.

members.name: lineItem
members.doc: Specific line item violation.

members.name: other
members.doc: General (other) violation.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the line item containing the violation.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location on a checkout or a cart page where the specific line item violation will be displayed.

description: Specific line item violation.

members.name: lineItem
members.doc: Specific line item violation.

members.name: other
members.doc: General (other) violation.

members.name: jurisdiction
members.doc: The name of the jurisdiction to which this tax detail applies. For example, "New York" or "Quebec".

members.name: jurisdictionType
members.doc: The type of the jurisdiction in which this tax detail applies.

members.name: nonTaxableAmount
members.doc: The amount of this line item price that was considered nontaxable. (Decimal value)

members.name: rate
members.doc: The rate at which this tax detail was calculated, e.g 0.1000 signifies 10% tax and 2.0000 signifies 200% tax. (Decimal value)

members.name: taxAmount
members.doc: The amount of tax estimated for this line item. (Decimal value)

members.name: taxName
members.doc:
The name of the tax against which this tax amount was calculated. For example, "NY State Sales Tax", "Quebec GST", etc.
This name should be explicit enough to allow the merchant to understand what tax was calculated.

members.name: taxType
members.doc: The type of tax that was calculated. Depends on the jurisdiction's tax laws. For example, "Sales Tax", "Income Tax", "Value Added Tax", etc.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: The taxable amount of this line item.

description:
TaxBreakdown represents tax information for a line item.
It holds the tax amount and the tax rate for each tax authority that apply on the line item.

members.name: autoTaxFallbackDetails
members.doc: Details of the fallback rate calculation.

members.name: manualRateReason
members.doc: Reason the manual calculation was used.

members.name: rateType
members.doc: Rate calculation type.

members.name: autoTaxFallbackDetails
members.doc: Details of the fallback rate calculation.

members.name: manualRateReason
members.doc: Reason the manual calculation was used.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of tax against which the calculation was performed.

members.name: rate
members.doc: Rate at which this tax detail was calculated.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Amount of tax for this tax detail.

members.name: calculationDetails
members.doc: Tax calculator that was active when the order was created.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated, added from line items.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: Calculated tax, added from line items.

members.name: original
members.doc: Subscription option name in the site's default language as defined in the [request envelope](https://dev.wix.com/docs/build-apps/develop-your-app/frameworks/self-hosting/supported-extensions/backend-extensions/add-self-hosted-service-plugin-extensions#request-envelope).

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Subscription option name translated into the buyer's language.

Default: Same as `original`.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Checkout template ID.

members.name: couponCode
members.doc:
Coupon code.

Note that a checkout can only hold one `couponCode` at a time. If an additional `couponCode` is added, it will override the existing `couponCode`.
For additional information, see the Coupons API.

members.name: customization
members.doc: Custom settings to apply to the checkout page created from this template.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc:
Line items.

Max: 300 items

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the checkout template.

When `status` is `INACTIVE` checkouts will not be created with this template `_id`. Instead, the function will redirect to the domain site.

Default: `ACTIVE`

members.name: checkoutTemplate
members.doc: Checkout template info to update.

members.name: checkoutTemplate
members.doc: Updated checkout template.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Line item ID.

members.name: availability
members.doc: Item availability details.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc: Catalog and item reference. Includes IDs for the item and the catalog it came from, as well as further optional info.

members.name: consentRequiredPaymentPolicy
members.doc: Item payment policy that requires customer consent to complete purchase. The payment policy will be displayed on the checkout page.

members.name: depositAmount
members.doc: Partial payment to be paid upfront during the checkout. Eligible for catalog items with `lineItem.paymentOption` type `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` only.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for display purposes for the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount for this line item's entire quantity.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Item price **before** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: lineItemPrice
members.doc: Total line item price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: media
members.doc: Line item image details.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`: The entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE`: The entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, check, or other offline payment methods.
+ `MEMBERSHIP`: Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is `0`.
+ `DEPOSIT_ONLINE`: Partial payment to be paid upfront during the checkout. Initial amount to be paid for each line item is defined by `lineItem.deposit`.
+ `MEMBERSHIP_OFFLINE`: Payment for this item can only be performed by using a membership and must be manually redeemed in the dashboard by the site owner. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is `0`.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU, item weight, and shippability.

members.name: price
members.doc: Item price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscounts
members.doc: Item price **before** line item discounts and **after** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: productName
members.doc:
Item name.
+ Stores - `product.name`
+ Bookings - `service.info.name`
+ Events - `ticket.name`

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Item quantity.

Min: `"1"`
Max: `"100000"`

members.name: rootCatalogItemId
members.doc:
In cases where `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is NOT the actual catalog item ID, this field will return the true item's ID.
+ For example, for Wix Bookings, `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is the booking ID. Therefore this value is set to the service ID.
+ In most cases, this field has the same value as `catalogReference.catalogItemId`.
+ Used in membership validation.

members.name: serviceProperties
members.doc: Service properties. When relevant, this contains information such as date and number of participants.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details for this line item.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total price after all discounts and tax.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeTax
members.doc: Total price after discounts, and before tax.

members.name: url
members.doc: URL to the item's page on the site.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Customer's tax ID.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Tax type.

Supported values:
+ `CPF`: for individual tax payers
+ `CNPJ`: for corporations

members.name: description
members.doc: Violation description. Can include rich text. Only HTTP or HTTPS links in the following format are allowed: `Click me`.

members.name: severity
members.doc: Severity of the violation. The violations are shown on the cart and checkout pages. A warning is displayed as yellow, and allows a site visitor to proceed with caution. An error is displayed as red, and doesn't allow a site visitor to proceed with the eCommerce flow.

members.name: target
members.doc: Target location on a checkout or cart page where the violation will be displayed.

members.name: disabledContinueShoppingButton
members.doc:
Whether to disable the "Continue shopping" button.

Default: `false`
